name: Pop Jelly: Sweet Smash Mania
description:
Match candies and collect them. Create rows of columns of 3 or more Candies of the same color to collect or blow them.
Pop Jelly: Sweet Smash Mania Features:
--Tasty candy graphics that will leave you hungry for more
--Easy and fun to play, but full of challenge.
--Met most shinning candies.
--Enjoy last bonus!
--Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
--Completely free to play,will not be required to pay!
